Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE COASTAL LIVING!!
Be impressed by this spacious two-level townhouse located in the popular Wombah Park Estate, built for low maintenance, lifestyle and in a great location the property comprises 3 bedrooms with built in robes, large scale family bathroom and spacious upstairs master bedroom featuring a private balcony, large walk in robe and en-suite.
The bright family sized living space incorporating the tremendous kitchen on the upper level is sure to impress the fussiest of chef's, combining granite bench tops, extensive built in cabinetry, quality Ilve and Bosch s/s appliances and boasts ocean glimpses through the expansive windows and entertaining balcony. Access to the private and peaceful rear yard is through the well-equipped laundry as well as a rear roller door in the double lock up garage, the residence features high ceilings, timber floorboards, infinity gas hot water, split system heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, stairwell skylight, alarm system and water tank, situated on a low maintenance 384m2(approx.) allotment. Within a hop, skip and jump to the beach, shops, reserves and town centre, this is the Ideal property for those wishing to downsize, secure an excellent lifestyle or investment property, low maintenance coastal living has never looked so good! Call us today!!
Insights: 26A Pomora Avenue, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2012 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Tranquil home in leafy location.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia Warren on 0432 182 271.
If you have ever dreamt of waking up to the sound of birds, brewing your morning cuppa and stepping out onto a sundrenched balcony with views across the Highton treetops, then look no further. Views extend across to the City and down the Bellarine Peninsula.
Tucked away in the leafy hills of Wandana Heights, beyond the private façade you will find a flexible floorplan with light filled living spaces. The home can comfortably be used as a four bedroom with three living zones or five bedrooms with two living zones, the split levels create a sense of space and privacy. This very quiet street is only moments from the Geelong ring road and schools.
The heart of the home, the kitchen/dining/living, a space where you could imagine spending hours not only enjoying the serenity but with the open space to entertain seamlessly from indoor to outdoor living. The spacious yard with a low maintenance garden, offers ample space for the budding gardener to enjoy the established gardens and for the handy man or lady, a spacious double garage with handy workshop space with rear access directly onto a walking/bike path, where there is tennis courts, parkland and oval only moments away.
Located just minutes to the Highton Village shopping, Waurn Ponds shopping mecca, Epworth Hospital, Christian College, Montpellier Primary and Deakin University just to name a few.
Key features:
-697m2 approx, block
-Views across to the Geelong CBD & Bellarine Peninsula
-Flexible floorplan with multiple living zones
-Established gardens
-Ducted Gas heating Reverse Cycle Air Conditioners
-Large double garage with workshop space
-Within minutes to local shopping & schooling
-A tightly held location with a community feel

Description:
Picture perfect in blue chip local
A huge opportunity has presented with this outstanding property in the blue chip pocket of Belmont perched on a very generous allotment of approximately 640sqm of prime land. The beautiful tree lined street only further complements the timeless clinker brick façade that is so highly sought after yet rarely found. The recently updated home offers lifestyle and convenience with the ever popular High Street shopping strip within minutes from the property and the Barwon River only a short stroll away. The home comprises spectacular hardwood floors throughout, a formal living area basking in natural light and a second living zone overlooking the garden and plenty of art deco features from the era. The kitchen is in its original form but includes a European built upright 900 litre oven and cook top perfect for the avid chef who love to cook and entertain. The back yard is beautifully landscaped with established trees and gardens and captures the northerly sun all year round and is ideal for the kids to play or the dogs to run. A great opportunity for the first home buyer, investor or the astute purchaser this property will surely impress in more ways than one. You will need to act quick to secure this highly sought after property.
- Beautifully presented and on a generous allotment of approx. 640sqm of land
- Polished floorboards throughout and art deco features
- Three bedrooms and two living area
- Landscaped gardens, established trees and large back yard
- Multi townhouse site (STCA)
- Ideally located close to all amenities
Insights: 6 George Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2014 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Home is the Perfect Beginning!
Spacious single level 3 bedroom home on a corner block of 547m2 (approx.), Completely secure with established gardens, a low maintenance lifestyle awaits you here. This stylish abode enjoys a wide entry hall, 3 bedrooms (BIRs, Master with WIR and Ensuite), separate laundry with access externally, a generously proportioned kitchen with stainless steel appliances. A spacious open plan living with adjoining dining area and a covered entertaining area overlooking the sunny secure rear gardens. The home stays warm in winter and cool in summer with its ducted heating and split system air conditioner in the main living area, there are also ceiling fans throughout the home. Complete with double remote garage with internal access into the home and additional side gate access with space for a caravan or boat. Enjoy the convenient location, close to the Grovedale Primary School, Marshall train station, local childcare, and offers immediate access to the Surf Coast Highway. Positioned within easy access to all amenities this is an opportunity not to be missed out on. To view this fantastic property, call for an inspection today!

Description:
Stylish Unit Ready for you to Move In and Enjoy!
This fully renovated unit in a very convenient location is perfect for the first home buyer, investor, downsizer or retiree. Well positioned within walking distance to Highton Village Shopping, bus stops and lots more, this stylish unit comprises good size living room, lovely kitchen overlooking the dining area, two bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom and separate laundry with access to side courtyard. Other features include polished floorboards, gas heater, split system heating/cooling, single carport plus a bonus off street parking space for a second car and a fabulous private, north facing front yard for you to take advantage of. This is a great opportunity for those looking for low maintenance living close to shops, transport, easy access to Ring Road and lots more. This stylish unit is ready for you to move in and enjoy and will definitely impress! Be quick to arrange an inspection!

Description:
Make. The. Move.
Just 15mins to the CBD and the Surfcoast, here is your opportunity to experience lifestyle living without moving out to the country!
Whether you're looking for a great playspace for the kids or room to build the shed you've always wanted, there's loads of room here on your half-acre block.
This spacious family home has 4 living zones, absolutely perfect if you've got teenage kids, like entertaining or have a conflict of what to watch on TV!
The central kitchen has been beautifully updated with a large WIP and all the luxuries you've come to expect like stone benchtops, soft close drawers and quality stainless steel appliances.
The master bedroom is cleverly located up the front of the home and enjoys a large WIR and ensuite. Three sizeable bedrooms at the rear have BIR and share a central bathroom with separate toilet. Enjoy built in desks in the study or pull them out if you require a 5th bedroom.
Head outside and spend sunny days around the north-facing pool or under the timber lined pergola. One things for sure, you're more than likely hosting Christmas this year once you're family get wind of the house you bought!

Description:
Titled & Ready To Build In Sought After Location
Situated in the highly popular Province Estate this is a great opportunity to acquire land at an entry level price, leaving you plenty in your budget to build your dream home. Located within walking distance to the Barrabool Hills Shopping centre, which showcases Cafes, Woolworths Supermarket, Chemist and a 24 hour gym.
Also positioned close to quality schools, public transport, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Epworth Hospital, Deakin University and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour. The Geelong CBD & stunning Water Front within 5 minutes and the world famous South Coast 10 minutes down the road. Don't miss your opportunity to build in a dream location at a fraction of the cost.

Description:
Perfect start or Savvy Investment!
Affordable entry level buying, this will make for the perfect first home, low maintenance investment or downsize. Featuring light-filled interiors, a north-facing alfresco deck, vehicle access to the spacious backyard, all upon a generous 525m2, this home ticks every box.
The open plan living zone creates the heart of the home, while flowing onto the sheltered alfresco deck for breezy indoor-outdoor living. Soaking up the northern sunshine, this outdoor zone provides the perfect setting for lazy weekends or entertaining family and friends. The kitchen will delight with a large built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom creates a calming oasis for parents. The walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the en suite features a shower, toilet, and single vanity. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry boasts ample storage and external access. You'll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans. The secure backyard wraps around the home - creating a wealth of space. The remote double lock-up garage features internal and external access, while gated side access to the backyard is ideal for storing caravans, boats, or trailers.
A carefree lifestyle is part of the package with everything you could possibly need within easy reach. Public transport and the Bellarine Rail Trail are only footsteps from your front door, with the Gateway Plaza, Leopold Primary School and all amenities only moments away. 10 minutes to both the Geelong CBD and the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula, it's easy to see why Leopold is becoming the place to be!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 136 Christies Road, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Light filled accommodation plus.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Constantine on 0401 393 993 or Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Abundant light filled accommodation with a flexible floor plan are the hallmarks of this delightful residence where space and convenience counts. Well located within easy reach of a range of key services this delightful home provides the ideal lifestyle setting.
Consisting of three large bedrooms, main bedroom with ensuite, light filled lounge, spacious kitchen and dining area leading to family room/fourth bedroom. Features include gas heating, split system A/C, double garage, full landscaping and undercover entertaining area.
Well positioned within easy distance to High Street shopping, Oberon South Primary School, and public transport. Only a short hop to the Torquay Road shopping hub, Highton Village, Barwon River walking tracks, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour. For those seeking big accommodation in a unique location enquire today!

Description:
Welcome home.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Flawlessly presented and situated on 924sqm (approx.) in the upheld Highton Hills, this residence is sure to captivate those looking for a spacious family home, with nothing to do but move in and enjoy the convenience of this location. The practical floor plan and immaculate condition offers space, style and class. Boasting a wide entrance hall, formal lounge and dining area with plenty of natural light, open plan kitchen/family with adjoining dining room features stone benches, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. This area opens out to the private north/westerly facing entraining area and gardens, perfect for hosting friends and family all year round.
The master bedroom is zoned at the front of the home with walk in robe and ensuite. There are a further three bedrooms with built in robes and built in desks, which are all serviced . Furthermore, the generous study adjacent to the master offers the ideal space for a home office during lockdown.
Extra comforts include ample storage space throughout, grand ceiling heights, polished timber flooring, gas ducted heating through the floor and evaporative cooling through the ceiling. The double garage is remote controlled and has internal house, plus rear roller door access into the backyard for convenience.
This home has lifestyle covered. Just five minutes to the Highton Village, ten minutes to Geelong CBD, close proximity to public transport, local schools and the Ring Road making commuting to both Melbourne and the Surfcoast a breeze.

Description:
Wookey home on 1,003m2 in premium pocket.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia Warren on 0432 182 271.
Nestled at the peak of Sunset Court this seamless home is awaiting its lucky new owner.
Built by the highly renowned Wookey Builders, this single level home offers a rare, sought after opportunity with views across Highton.
When location, privacy and serenity matter this tightly held pocket of Highton ticks all the boxes. Beyond the attractive, classic façade you will find vast open plan spaces drenched in natural light, a flexible family friendly floorplan & garden views from all aspects. This homes renovation showcases the perfect blend of modern meets classic with bay windows, Coonara fireplace & lead-light windows in combination with the chic white kitchen and neutral flooring. You will enjoy the garden views from all aspects of the home, particularly the living space that leads through double doors to the outdoor entertaining space with unrivalled views across Highton treetops and northern sunlight. Sitting on a generous 1,003m2 (approx.) allotment with private, manicured gardens this home is ready for someone to move in, sit back and enjoy glass of red in front of the fire.
Key features:
-1,003m2 block (approx.)
-Wookey built home
-Coonara & gas fire
-Renovated and updated throughout
-Views across Highton treetops
-Flexible floorplan with 4 bedrooms
-Two living spaces
-Natural light throughout
-Double garage with ample storage
-Established gardens
-Premium Highton location
-5 minutes to Highton Village shopping
-5 minutes to Waurn Ponds shopping
-12 minutes to the Geelong CBD
3D floorplan tour available, please contact Julia to receive the link.

Description:
Close to Shops with Subdivision Potential
Positioned on approximately 594m2 of land, the location of this property is perfect for a home office or potential subdivision development (STCA). This solid double brick home will be appreciated by anyone who desires easy living in a convenient location. It features a dining and living zone, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a fully fenced private garden area.
Situated opposite the Ash Road shops, with kindergarten and primary school nearby, this is certainly a handy position. Leopold is fast becoming recognised as an ideal location with Geelong just a short commute away and easy access to the world class beaches of the Bellarine. Simply snap this one up and start reaping the rewards.

Titled Land Now Selling
The Dunes, Torquay has been designed to complement both the landscape and the laid back coastal lifestyle - while giving you state-of-the-art facilities and beautiful
scenery to build your new home.
Centrally located to let you make the most of Torquay's attractions The Dunes gives you quick and easy access to the beach and the Sands Golf Club, new shopping centres, schools, sporting facilities and just around the point leads you straight to Torquay's main beach.
Once you arrive home to The Dunes, the atmosphere, clean ocean air and open space will make it seem as if you are in a world of your own.

Located in a prime pocket this spacious home is awaiting its lucky new owner!
Presenting a seamless floorplan on the ground level you will be greeted by a large study/living, perfect for working from home with plenty of space for multiple people. Further through you will pass the second living and then land in the open plan dining, kitchen, family living zone that is generously drenched in northern light.
Upstairs you will land in yet another living space or 'retreat', here you will also find a spacious well-appointed master bedroom with walk in robe/ ensuite and a further three bedrooms & comfortable main bathroom.
Flow from indoors to outdoors onto the large north facing entertaining space with peaceful views and ample space for all year round family fun.
Local amenities are just at your fingertips with the Barrabool Hills shopping complex just minutes stroll away from your front door, Highton Village café precinct just 5 minutes and a vast choice of great schooling Montpellier primary, Belmont High school and prestigious private schooling such as the Geelong College, St Josephs College and Sacred Heart College within 10 minutes.

-North facing 657m2 allotment

Description:
Relaxed & Convenient Living
This neatly maintained home offers comfortable living for the first home buyers, young families or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complimented by its superb location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Situated in the highly sought-after Kensignton Estate and set on approximately 509m2, this well-maintained family home has so much to offer. Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms, plus a study. The master bedroom offers a private ensuite and ample robe space, while remaining bedrooms utilize the spacious central bathroom and separate toilet. The convenient layout of this floorplan incorporates the open plan kitchen, dining and living zone at the hub of the home. The functional kitchen includes dishwasher, large stainless-steel gas cooktop & oven, and an abundance of storage and bench space. Furthermore, the two separate living zones provide extra space for the whole family to relax and enjoy.
Completing this ideal property is the enormous, undercover outdoor entertaining area. As far as alfresco dining goes, this is certainly impressive, perfect for enjoying family BBQs. The rear yard also offers a lush lawn and abundance of yard space is waiting to be enjoyed by all, as well as the low maintenance border garden being both pretty and practical.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, split system A/C and double garage.
Within close proximity to Leopold Primary school, Gateway Plaza, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport, parks, and playgrounds only a stones throw away. Not to mention only moments from some of the best attractions the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. This home simply caters to everyone! Sure to please both investment buyers and those looking for a new family residence. This property is every bit as good as it looks from the street. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
Smart Effortless Living
This low maintenance brick and tile home in a quiet court location is spacious, well planned and sunny. With a floor plan that will be appreciated by families or downsizers alike, it features two separate and comfortable living zones. Choose from the open plan kitchen, living and dining area, which enjoys a northerly aspect and easy indoor/outdoor flow. Or alternatively make your self at home in the generous lounge, which is the ideal parents retreat or quiet zone. The adjacent master bedroom includes a generous walk-in robe and an en-suite. Two additional bedrooms are located towards the rear of the home and both have built in robes. Designed to make everyday life and entertaining effortless, the centrally located kitchen features ample storage and workspace, gas cooking and a garden outlook. A family sized bathroom with a separate bath and shower, a conveniently positioned laundry, and a double garage with roller door access to the rear garden are also included. Polished timber flooring adds character and the ducted heating throughout is a welcome bonus.
A covered patio provides the perfect spot for outdoor entertaining, and there is room for back yard games on the sunny lawn. The 576m² (approx) grounds are fenced and include easy care established gardens and a handy shed. There is plentiful off street parking too.
Situated in a popular and peaceful enclave with shops, school and parks close by; this home will be appreciated by anyone looking for smart uncomplicated living and a home for all seasons.
Insights: 14 Lochlan Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2013 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Close to everything
Set in a quiet, highly sought-after pocket of Waurn Ponds, this lovely family home is easy to live in and perfectly located for active people. Moments from schools, public transport, shopping and leisure activities, everything is at your doorstep work, play, travel, learn, exercise, and relax welcome home
Features
- Built in 2006 by Burbank Homes
- Sited on approximately 766sqm
- Carpet in all bedrooms
- Gas cooking
- Stone Island bench with waterfall sides
- Multiple living areas
- Internal access to house from garage
- Ducted heating
- Split system cooling
- Solar gas boosted hot water
- Stacker sliding doors open onto undercover entertaining
- Corten water feature
- Enclosed rear yard
- Easy to maintain gardens
- 3m x 3m garden shed
- 12 solar panels
- Security
- Off street parking for multiple cars
Lifestyle
- Entertain and relax bathed in sunshine on your private deck
- Walk or ride to explore the Waurn Ponds walking track.
- Schools close byHighton Primary, Mandama Primary, Nazareth Catholic Primary, Grovedale College and Christian College
- Walk or drive to the Waurn Ponds Shopping precinct, Deakin University and Waurn Ponds Train Station
- 15-minute drive to the Surf Coast
- Easy access to Melbourne via the ring road
COVID 19 Restrictions:
The following restrictions apply to residents of restricted areas wishing to inspect the property.
Private Inspections only, by prior appointment (Contact Robyn)
Only one person from restricted areas per private inspection.
